Translations.Text: Yome,`sōzō nasa reru okata, anata no omo no o nanioite
Ichi gyōketsu kara, ningen o tsukura reta
Yome,`anata no omo wa, saikō no sonki de arare
hitsu ni yotte (kaku koto o) oshie rareta okata
Ningen ni michi naru koto o oshie rareta okatadearu
jibun de nani mo tarinai tokoro wa nai to kangaete iru
Hontōni anata no omo ni (subete no mono wa) kisa reru nodearu
Anata wa, soshi suru mono o mita ka
hitori no shimo be (muhanmado) ga, reihai o sasageru toki ni
Anata wa, kare (soshi suru mono) ga,(tadashī michi) ni michibika rete iru to omou no ka
(shinri o) usodearu to shite se o muketa to omou no ka
Kare wa, arrā ga mite ora reru koto o shiranai no ka
Danjite sōde wanai. Moshi kare ga tome nainaraba, ware wa maegami de kare o toraerudearou
Soshite kare no (kyūjo no tame ni) ichimi o shōshū sa se nasai
Ware wa kanshu (no tenshi) o shōshū surudearou
Danjite sō arubekide wanai. Anata wa kare ni shitagatte wa naranai. Ichizu ni sajida shite (omoni) chikadzuke. 〔Sajida〕
